title: tg stuck - killing rpcdaemon recovered
body:
Commit: `67de2a3a4661adc746cc420fcb17fb6655287917`

The node was running perfectly for multiple days, then it just locked up.

The stage sync was fine until Stage 14:
```

Now you'll see there's a almost 15 minute delay until the next log entry
```
INFO [12-01|18:39:13.798] Regenerated local transaction journal    transactions=0 accounts=0
ERROR[12-01|18:43:09.161] Failed to unregister sync peer           peer=21787afd4de2d5a4 err="peer is not registered"

INFO [12-01|20:39:13.799] Regenerated local transaction journal    transactions=0 accounts=0
```
You can also see by the timestamps above nothing is happening for hours...

I then killed the `rpcdaemon` process in the background and `tg` recovered...

```
INFO [12-01|21:31:49.708] event subscription channel was closed    reason="rpc error: code = Unavailable desc = transport is closing"

I know what changed... an ethstats connection, my ethstats service was down for a while, brought it back up yesterday. I think my node is stuck again.
